Department.preloadDept ( $  nr = 0  ) 

Preloads all information of one department into the objects internal buffer $preload_dept and sets the internal flag $is_preloaded. The information is returned individually through the appropriate methods public

Parameters:
int Department number
Returns:
boolean

Department.unloadDept (  ) 

Empties the internal buffer $preload_dept and resets the internal flag $is_preloaded public

Returns:
boolean

Department._getItem ( $  item = '',
$  retname = '' 
)

Gets the item information of a department from the care_department table. Use only if the department number was previously set with the constructor or with the setDeptNr() method. private

Parameters:

string actual return name of the item (optional: used if the first param has an aliasing)
